title: Thai Mango Asian Bistro
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Chinese, Thai, Beer/Wine, Delivery, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Almost any menu item can be made vegan and can be made with tofu. All dishes are designed around vegetables and a particular sauce. Try the Mongolian tofu (sauteed onions, tofu, garlic, and green peppers in sweet plum sauce) and the tofu pad woon wen (Thai noodles with tofu and various vegetables). Knowledgeable accommodating staff.
